# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Transport system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of:
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)
- Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using entities without ingredients
- Ensure that entities have the required ingredients before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using steam engines without connection
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the power grid before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using entities without being plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that entities are plugged into the electric network before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using transport belts without items
- Ensure that transport belts have items to transport before attempting to use them.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
